name: Elderflower Sparking Iced Tea
description: This is a refreshing anytime drink, and if you want to create a celebratory cocktail, switch soda for sparkling white wine. Try other fruit cordials as well.
preparation: Place the tea in a measuring cup. Pour in water and steep for 3 minutes. Strain and allow tea to cool.
Add elderflower cordial to cooled tea.
Divide between two tall glasses containing ice, top up with soda water, and stir.
Add a mint sprig and wedge of lemon or lime, if using.
